00025 #include "syx-object.h"
00026 #include "syx-scheduler.h"
00027 
00028 #ifdef HAVE_SYS_TIME_H
00029 #include <sys/time.h>
00030 #endif
00031 #include <sys/types.h>
00032 #ifdef HAVE_UNISTD_H
00033 #include <unistd.h>
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 static SyxSchedulerPoll *_syx_scheduler_poll_read = NULL;
00037 static SyxSchedulerPoll *_syx_scheduler_poll_write = NULL;
00038 static fd_set _syx_scheduler_poll_rfds;
00039 static fd_set _syx_scheduler_poll_wfds;
00040 static syx_int32 _syx_scheduler_poll_nfds = -1;
00041 
00042 static int
00043 _syx_scheduler_process_poll (int res, SyxSchedulerPoll *poll, fd_set *fds)
00044 {
00045   SyxSchedulerPoll *p, *oldp, *tmp;
00046   for (oldp=NULL, p=poll; p && res > 0;)
00047     {
00048       if (FD_ISSET (p->fd, fds))
00049         {
00050           if (oldp)
00051             oldp->next = p->next;
00052           else
00053             _syx_scheduler_poll_read = p->next;
00054           syx_semaphore_signal (p->semaphore);
00055 
00056           /* Unset the fd from the original fd_set */
00057           FD_CLR (p->fd, fds);
00058 
00059           tmp = p;
00060           p = p->next;
00061           syx_free (tmp);
00062 
00063           /* Decrement res to stop the loop once we found all the ready descriptors */
00064           res--;
00065         }
00066       else
00067         {
00068           /* Save the maximum file descriptor number */
00069           if (p->fd > _syx_scheduler_poll_nfds)
00070             _syx_scheduler_poll_nfds = p->fd;
00071           oldp = p;
00072           p = p->next;
00073         }
00074     }
00075   return res;
00076 }
00077 
00078 void
00079 _syx_scheduler_init_platform (void)
00080 {
00081   FD_ZERO(&_syx_scheduler_poll_rfds);
00082   FD_ZERO(&_syx_scheduler_poll_wfds);
00083 }
00084 
00085 void
00086 _syx_scheduler_poll_wait_platform (void)
00087 {
00088   static struct timeval tv = {0, 1};
00089   syx_int32 res;
00090   /* we copy file descriptors because select will change them */
00091   fd_set r = _syx_scheduler_poll_rfds;
00092   fd_set w = _syx_scheduler_poll_wfds;
00093 
00094   res = select (_syx_scheduler_poll_nfds + 1, &r, &w, NULL, &tv);
00095   if (res == -1)
00096     return;
00097 
00098   if (res > 0)
00099     {
00100       _syx_scheduler_poll_nfds = -1;
00101 
00102       res = _syx_scheduler_process_poll (res, _syx_scheduler_poll_read, &_syx_scheduler_poll_rfds);
00103       (void) _syx_scheduler_process_poll (res, _syx_scheduler_poll_write, &_syx_scheduler_poll_wfds);
00104     }
00105 }
00106 
00107 void
00108 _syx_scheduler_quit_platform (void)
00109 {
00110   SyxSchedulerPoll *p, *pp;
00111 
00112   for (p=_syx_scheduler_poll_read; p;)
00113     {
00114       pp = p;
00115       p = p->next;
00116       syx_free (pp);
00117     }
00118   _syx_scheduler_poll_read = NULL;
00119 
00120   for (p=_syx_scheduler_poll_write; p;)
00121     {
00122       pp = p;
00123       p = p->next;
00124       syx_free (pp);
00125     }
00126   _syx_scheduler_poll_write = NULL;
00127 }

00142 
00149 void
00150 syx_scheduler_poll_read_register (syx_nint fd, SyxOop semaphore)
00151 {
00152   SyxSchedulerPoll *p = (SyxSchedulerPoll *) syx_malloc (sizeof (SyxSchedulerPoll));
00153 
00154   p->fd = fd;
00155   if (fd > _syx_scheduler_poll_nfds)
00156     _syx_scheduler_poll_nfds = fd;
00157 
00158   FD_SET(fd, &_syx_scheduler_poll_rfds);
00159   
00160   p->semaphore = semaphore;
00161   p->next = _syx_scheduler_poll_read;
00162   _syx_scheduler_poll_read = p;
00163 }
00164 
00171 void
00172 syx_scheduler_poll_write_register (syx_nint fd, SyxOop semaphore)
00173 {
00174   SyxSchedulerPoll *p = (SyxSchedulerPoll *) syx_malloc (sizeof (SyxSchedulerPoll));
00175 
00176   p->fd = fd;
00177   if (fd > _syx_scheduler_poll_nfds)
00178     _syx_scheduler_poll_nfds = fd;
00179 
00180   FD_SET(fd, &_syx_scheduler_poll_wfds);
00181 
00182   p->semaphore = semaphore;
00183   p->next = _syx_scheduler_poll_write;
00184   _syx_scheduler_poll_write = p;
00185 }
